Question
========

What is the correct description of an interaction effect between Factor A and B in a two-way ANOVA? 
Answerlist
----------
* The effect of Factor A, controlled for Factor B.
* The effect of Factor A, while Factor B is held constant.
* The effect of Factor A depends on the value on Factor B.
* The effect of Factor A, while Factor B is ignored.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
